SA11n1086:3: iha atīśighraṃ sarvajñatāprāptukāmena prekṣāvatā tatprāpaka-hetu-pratyayebhyo'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
SA11n1086:4: itthamiyaṃ sarvajñatā tu hetuṃ vinā bhavituṃ na yujyate,
SA11n1086:6: nirapekṣabhāve tu kutrāpi pratigho na syād,
SA11n1086:7: yato hi sarve'pi sarvajñā eva na bhavanti |
SA11n1086:8: kiṃ tarhi kasyacit kadācit kiñcinmātraṃmūtatvāt sarvaṃ hi vastu hetusāpekṣameva |
SA11n1086:21: ucyate, mādṛśo jātyandhasadṛśastān darśayituṃ na śaknoti,
SA11n1086:22: tathāpi bhagavataivābhisaṃbuddhaya vineyajanebhyo yathoktaṃ tathaiva mayā bhagavadvacanenaiva kathyate |
SA11n1086:23: bhagavāṃstan avocat-“guhyādhipate! tat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam“ iti |
SA11n1086:24: tasmāt sarvajñatāmadhigantukāmaiḥ karuṇā-bodhicittopāyeṣu eteṣu triṣu śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1086:25: karuṇayā preryamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvābhyuddhāraṇartham avaśyaṃ pratijñāsyanti |
SA11n1086:27: tatra praviśya paripūrṇa puṇyajñānasambhāram avaśyaṃ sādhayati |
SA11n1086:29: tarhi sarvajñatāmūlaṃ tu karuṇāyā eva bhūtatvāt sā tu prathamatarameva bhavanīyā |
SA11n1086:30: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre-“na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1086:31: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratibiddhaḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1086:35: mahākaruṇāparigṛhītatvād bhagavanto buddhāḥ sakalasvārthasampattilābhe'pi sattvadhātuparyavasānaparyantaṃ tiṣṭhanti |
SA11n1086:37: sattvān avalokya tacchāntanirvāṇanagaraṃ prajvaladayogṛhavad dūraṃ tyaktatvād bhagavatām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇahetustu sā mahākaruṇā eva |
SA11n1086:39: saṃprati upekṣābhāvanayā sarvasattveṣu anurāgaṃ dveṣaṃ ca nirasya samācittatā prathamaṃ niṣpādayitavyā |
SA11n1086:42: anādimati ca saṃsāre na kaścit sattvo yo nābhūt śataśo me bandhuriti paricintaya-taścātra ko viśeṣaḥ syāt ?
SA11n1086:43: tarhi kasmiṃścid anurāgaḥ kasmiṃścicca dveṣo bhavet,
SA11n1086:44: tasmān mayā sarveṣu sattveṣu cittasamataiva kāryā iti |
SA11n1086:45: evaṃ manasikāreṇa madhyasthapakṣata ārabhya mitre śatrau cacittasamatāmeva bhāvayet |
SA11n1086:46: tataḥ sarvasattveṣu cittasamatāṃ sādhayitvā maitrīṃ bhāvayet |
SA11n1086:47: maitrījalena cittasaṃtānaṃ siṃcayitvā vidyamānasuvarṇabhūmivat kṛtvā karuṇābījavapane sukhena atisuvistāro bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:50: lokatrayasya sarvasattvānāṃ trividhaduḥkhatayā yathāyogam atyantaduḥkhitatvāt tadartha sarvasattveṣu sā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1086:51: tathā ca ye tāvannākārakāste vividhacirantanadīrghakālikadāhādi-dukheḥṣu nimagnā eva bhāvato varṇitāḥ |
SA11n1086:52: tathā pretā api prāyo duḥsahatīvrakṣuttṛṣuduḥkhāgnyabhisaṃśoṣitamūrtayo bahuduḥkhamanubhavanti iti varṇitāḥ |
SA11n1086:54: manuṣyā api kāmaparyeṣaṇākārpaṇyād anyo'nyadrohopadhātakṛtaṃ priyaviprayogāpriyasaṃyogaṃ dāridrayādyutpannam aprameyaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanto dṛśyanto |
SA11n1086:56: ye ca vividhakudṛṣṭigahananimagnāste sarve'pi duḥkhahetutvāt prapatasthā iva atiduḥkhitā eva |
SA11n1086:58: devā api ye kāmavacarāste'pi nityacyavanapatanādibhayaśkopahatāḥ kathaṃ sukhitā nāma ?
SA11n1086:59: saṃskāradu khaṃ tu karmakleśalakṣaṇaṃ hetuparatantrasvabhāvaṃ pratikṣaṇabhaṅgurasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ ca sakalajagati vyāptam |
SA11n1086:60: tasmāt sakalameva jagad duḥkhāgnijvālāntarapraviṣṭam avetya yathā mama duḥkham apriyam anyeṣāmapi tādṛśam iti cintayatā |
SA11n1086:61: aho bata ! duḥkhitā mamaite priyasattvāstu kathaṃ tadduḥkhamuktāḥ syuriti svātmaduḥkhavat kṛtvā tannivāraṇecchākārayā karuṇayā samādhyavasthāyāṃ sarvacaryāsu vāpi sarvadā sarvasattvān bhāvayet |
SA11n1086:62: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣeṣu anubhūtapūrvoktavividhaduḥkheṣu anupaśyatā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1086:63: tataḥ sattvasamatayāviśeṣamapaśyatā 'sarve sattvāstu me bandhubhūtā eva' iti paricintayatā madhyamapakṣeṣu bhavanīyā |
SA11n1086:64: yadā tatra mitrapakṣeṣviva sā karuṇā tulyā pravṛttā bhavati tadā daśasu dikṣu sarvasattveṣu bhāvayet |
SA11n1086:65: yadā duḥkhitapriyaśiśoḥ mātṛvat svātmano'tipriyaṃ duḥkhata uddaraṇecchākārā svarasavāhinīṃ sarvasattveṣu samapravṛttā kṛpā bhavati tadā sā niṣpannā bhavati,
SA11n1086:67: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣe kṛtā maitrībhāvanā sukhasaṃyogecchākārā bhavati,
SA11n1086:69: tathā'bhyastā ca sā karuṇā kramaśaḥ sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇecchāṃ svarasena eva utpādayati |
SA11n1086:71: tad bodhicittaṃ tu dvividham-saṃvṛtaṃ paramārtha ca |
SA11n1086:72: tatra saṃvṛtaṃ tu karuṇayā sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇaṃ pratijñāya 'jagaddhitāya buddho bhaveyam' iti,
SA11n1086:80: tatsiddhistu satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāyogabhāvanākaraṇād bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:81: āryasaṃdhinirmocane yathā “maitreya ! śrāvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ vā ye'pi sarve'pi laukikalokottarakuśaladharmāḥ śamathavipaśyanāphalā veditavyā iti |
SA11n1086:82: “ taddvayoḥ sarvasamādhisaṃgṛhītatvāt sarvayogibhiḥ sadā avaśyaṃ śamathavipaśyane sevanīye |
SA11n1086:84: tadyathā-“mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ vividhasamādhayo darśitāḥ,
SA11n1086:89: tasmāt tatraiva āryasaṃdhinirmocane uktam “dhyānena hi kleśānāṃ vikrāntiḥ |
SA11n1086:99: yo anyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye || iti uktam |
SA11n1086:101: āryavinayadharmaśravaṇaṃ ca vinā samādhimātreṇa saṃtoṣagrahaṇe tu ahaṃkāravaśād abhimāne patitāḥ janmajarārogamaraṇaśokaparidevanāduḥkhadaurmanasyakopāparimuktāḥ |
SA11n1086:103: tān saṃdhāya tathāgatena evam uktam-parasmād anukūlaśrotā tu jarāmaraṇamukto bhaviṣyati“ iti |
SA11n1086:104: tasmāt sakalāvaraṇaṃ vihāya viśuddhajñānodbhavakāmena śamathe sthitvā prajñā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1086:110: āryamahāyānaśraddhābhāvanāsūtre'pi uktam-“kulaputra ! prajñāyām anupasthitau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyānaśraddhā mahāyāne kathamapi utpatsyate (iti)
SA11n1086:112: kulaputra ! anena paryāyeṇāpi evaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yā kācid mahāyānaśraddhā mahāyāne utpatsyate sā sarvā tu avikṣiptacittena dharmārthasaṃcintanāt samutpannā veditavyā |“
SA11n1086:113: śamathaṃ vinā vipaśyanāmātreṇa yogicittaṃ viṣayeṣu vikṣipyate,
SA11n1086:117: ataḥ āryamahāparinirvāṇasūtre'pi uktam- “śrāvakaistu tathāgatagotraṃ na dṛśyate |
SA11n1086:122: śamathabalena ca vāyunā akṣobhyapradīpavad vikalpavāyubhiścittaṃ na kampate |
SA11n1086:125: akampiyaḥ śamathabalena bhoti śailopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya |
SA11n1086:127: tatra ādau saṃprati tena yoginā sukhaṃ śīghraṃ ca śamatha-vipaśyanāsiddhaye śamathavipaśyanāsambhāraḥ sevanīyaḥ |
SA11n1086:151: śrāvakasaṃvare pārājikapratividhāne'yogyaṃ kathanaṃ yadasti tasminnapi paścāttāpaḥ,
SA11n1086:156: tasmāt kaukṛtyābhāvaṃ kṛtvā bhāvanāyām abhiyogaḥ karttavyaḥ |
SA11n1086:157: kāmeṣvapi iha janmāntare ca bhāvino vividhadoṣān manasikṛtya teṣu vikalpaḥ pariharttavyaḥ |
SA11n1086:158: etāvatā saṃsārabhāvaḥ priyo'priyo vāpi tatsarvaṃ tu vināśadharmi asthiraṃ ca |
SA11n1086:159: niścayena tatsarvasmin mayi ca aciraṃ viyoge bhāve sati mama tasmin katham adhyavasitādirbhaved iti bhāvanayā sarve vikalpāḥ pariharttavyāḥ |
SA11n1086:164: tatra kīdṛśaṃ satpuruṣam āśrayed iti cet-yo bahuśrutaḥ prasannavāk,
SA11n1086:168: ittham āryasaṃdhinirmocane-“yatheccham āryākhyānāśravaṇaṃ hi vipaśyanāvighnaḥ“ iti uktam |
SA11n1086:173: yasya nītārthasūtraneyārthasūtrādisunirṇayastādṛśe bodhisattve niḥśaṅke sati bhāvanāyām aikāntikaniścayo bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:174: anyathā saṃśayāndolitayānasthitastu śṛṅgāṭakamadhyagatamanuṣyavat kutrāpi aikāntikaniścayo na bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:175: yoginā tu sadā matsyamāṃsādi parihṛtya apratikūlaṃ bhojanaṃ niyatamātrakaṃ bhoktavyam |
SA11n1086:177: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī bhāvanākāle sarvam itikaraṇīyaṃ parisamāpyaṃ kṛtamūtrapurīṣaḥ kaṇṭakasvarādirahite mano'nūkūle pradeśe sthitvā mayā sarvasattvā bodhimaṇḍe niṣpādayitavyā iti viniścayan,
SA11n1086:178: sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtya daśadigavasthitān sarvabuddhabhodhisattvān pañcāṅgena praṇipatyāgrato buddhabodhisattvan paṭādau sthāpayitvā anyatra vā yathāvat tebhyaśca yathāruci pūjāstavanaṃ kṛtvā svapāpaṃ pradeśya,
SA11n1086:180: mṛdutarasukhāsane vairocanabhaṭṭārakabaddhaparyaṅkena ardhaparyaṅkena vā niṣpādya nātyunmūīlite nātinimīlite nāsikāgravinyaste cakṣuṣī kṛtvā,
SA11n1086:183: śiro nonnatam nāvanataṃ eka-pārśve niścalaṃ sthāpayitavyam |
SA11n1086:187: āśvāspraśvāsāstu na saśabdā nāpi sthūlā nāpi tvaritāḥ karaṇīyāḥ |
SA11n1086:188: kiṃ tvasaṃlakṣyamāṇā mandaṃ mandamanābhogena yathā praviśeyurnirgaccheyurvā tathā karaṇiyam |
SA11n1086:190: bāhyaviṣayavikṣepaśānteḥ āntarālambane satataṃ svarasavāhi prītiprasrabdhivaccitta eva sthitistu śamatha iti ucyate |
SA11n1086:194: āryasaṃdhinirmocane'pi-“bhagavan kathaṃ śamathaparigaveṣaṇaṃ vipaśyanākauśalaṃ cāsti ? ucyate |
SA11n1086:196: tadyathā-ye sūtrageyavyākaraṇa-gāthā-udāna-nidāna-avadāna-itivṛttaka-jātaka-vaipulya-adbhūtadharma-upadeśa-vargāḥ bodhisattvebhya ākhyātāste bodhisattvaiḥ saṃśrutya saṃdhārya,
SA11n1086:202: yena cittena manasikārastaccitābhyantaraṃ satataṃ manasikāreṇa manasikāraḥ |
SA11n1086:203: tathā praviśya tatra bahuśaḥ sthitaḥ tasyāṃ kāyaprasrabdhicittaprasrabdhisambhavaśca yo'sti sa tu śamatha iti |
SA11n1086:208: cittavikṣepaṃ vihāya yathā cintitadharmaḥ teṣāmeva abhyantare samādhigocarapratibimbaṃ pratyavekṣate,
SA11n1086:211: tajjñeyarthe vivicyate pravivecanaṃ parikalpanaṃ paryavekṣaṇaṃ kṣāntiḥ,
SA11n1086:216: tatra śamathābhinirhārakāmo yogī prathamaṃ tāvat sūtrageyādisakalapravacanaṃ tu tathatāparāyaṇam,
SA11n1086:218: tathatāpravaṇama iti sarvaṃ saṃgrāhya tatra cittam upasthāpayet |
SA11n1086:219: etāvatā kiyadākāreṇa sarvadharmasaṃgrahabhute skandhādau tatra cittam upasthāpayet |
SA11n1086:226: tathā yatra icchālambanaṃ tasmin cittaṃ sthāpayitvā tatraiva uparyupari satataṃ cittaṃ sthāpayet |
SA11n1086:228: 'kim ālambanaṃ sugṛṇhāti līyate vā athavā bāhyaviṣayavyasekād vikṣipyate’ iti parīkṣitavyam |
SA11n1086:229: tatra yadi styānamiddhābhibhavād cittaṃ līnaṃ vā layābhiśaṅkā darśane tatkāle pramodya vastuni buddhapratimādau vā alokasaṃjñāmanasikaraḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1086:230: atha layam upaśāmya yathāpi tatraiva ālambane cittālambanam atisphuṭadarśanaṃ bhavati tathā karaṇiyam |
SA11n1086:231: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vā vinimīlitākṣavad vā cittam ālambanaṃ atisphuṭaraṃ na paśyati tadā līnaṃ veditavyam |
SA11n1086:233: anyamanasikāreṇa vā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayecchayā cittauddhatyaṃ vā auddhatyaśaṅkādarśanaṃ vā tadā sarve saṃskārā anityā duḥkhādimanosaṃvegavastu manasi karttavyam |
SA11n1086:234: tataḥ vikṣepaśāntiṃ kṛtvā smṛtisamprajanyarajjunā manonāgaḥ tadālambanastambhe eva bandhitavyaḥ |
SA11n1086:235: yadā layauddhatye na bhavataḥ tadālambena cittapraśamavahitāṃ paśyet,
SA11n1086:236: tadā ābhogaśithilikaraṇād upekṣayā tatkāle yāvadicchaṃ tiṣṭhet |
SA11n1086:237: itthaṃ bhāvitaśamathasya taccharīrasya cittasya ca praśrabdhirbhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:241: īdṛśaṃ ca mantavyam bhagavataḥ sarvavacanaṃ tu subhaṣitam,
SA11n1086:242: sākṣāt paramparayā vā tattvapratyakṣavyañajanaṃ tattvaparāyaṇameva ca |
SA11n1086:247: prajñayā eva tattvamavagamyate prajñayaiva āvaraṇaṃ samyak prahīyate |
SA11n1086:248: tasmānmayā śamathe sthitvā prajñayā tattvaṃ paryeṣitavyam |
SA11n1086:249: śamathamātreṇa saṃtoṣo na karaṇīya iti vicāraṇīyam |
SA11n1086:253: āryasaṃdhinirmocane yathoktam “bhagavan ! kayā pāramitayā bodhisattvaḥ dharmaniḥsvabhāvatāṃ gṛṇhīyāt ?
SA11n1086:264: tasmāt tadyathā bhrama eva ayaṃ lokasya yadutāhaṃ memeti vicāritavyam |
SA11n1086:270: tatparamāṇuśo vibhāge paramāṇavo'pi bhāgaśaḥ svabhāvatāpratyavekṣamāṇāḥ svabhāvaniścayagrahaṇābhāvāt |
SA11n1086:271: tasmād anādikālikavitatharūpādyabhiniveśavaśāt svapnopalabhyamānarūpādipratibhāsavad bālānāṃ cittameva bahiḥ vicchinnamiva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ khyāti |
SA11n1086:272: paramārthatastatra rūpādistu na cittākāravyatirikta iti vicārayet |
SA11n1086:273: tad evaṃ traidhātukamidaṃ tu cittamātramiti cintayet |
SA11n1086:274: sa evaṃ cittameva sakaladharmaprajñaptiṃ niścitya tatra pratyavekṣya ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣito bhavatīti cittasvabhāvamapi pratyavekṣate |
SA11n1086:276: cittamapi paramārthaḥ satyaṃ bhavitum na yujyate |
SA11n1086:277: yadā hi alīkasvabhāvarūpādyākaropagrahaṇe cittameva citrākāraṃ pratibhāsate,
SA11n1086:279: yathā rūpādī alīkaṃ tathā cittamapi tadavyatiriktatvād alīkameva |
SA11n1086:280: yathā citrākāratayā rūpādayo naikānekasvabhāvāḥ tathā cittamapi tadavyatirekeṇa anikānekasvabhāvam |
SA11n1086:282: yathā cittamevaṃ sarvadharmā api māyāsvabhāvasadṛśā eva iti vicārayet |
SA11n1086:283: tena tathā prajñayā cittasvabhāve pratyevekṣamāṇe paramārthataḥ cittam abhyantare'pi nopalabhate,
SA11n1086:291: cittaṃ tu agrāhyam anirdeśyam, arūpam ca |
SA11n1086:292: anirdeśyam agrahyam arūpam ca yadasti tasya svabhāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ?
SA11n1086:293: tathā āryaratnakūṭe yathoktam-“kāśyapa ! cittaṃ tu parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
SA11n1086:294: yanna labdhaṃ tanna ālambyate yacca nālambyate |
SA11n1086:299: tad evaṃ parīkṣyamāṇe cittasya ādiṃ na samanupasyati,
SA11n1086:300: antaṃ na samanupaśyati madhyaṃ na samanupaśyati |
SA11n1086:301: yathā ca cittam anantamadhyaṃ tathā sarvadharmānapi anantamadhyam avagacchet |
SA11n1086:302: tena tadevaṃ cittam anantamadhyam avagamya kimapi cittasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
SA11n1086:303: yadapi cittaṃ parīkṣyate tadapi śūnyaṃ pratividhyati |
SA11n1086:305: tena tathā prajñayā sarvadharmasvabhāvasya asamanudarśanatvād rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ vā,
SA11n1086:310: yathā rūpaṃ na vikalpayati tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñāneṣvapi na vikalpayati |
SA11n1086:313: tad evaṃ prajñayā parīkṣyamāṇo yadā yoginā kasyacid vastunaḥ svabhāvaparamārthaniścayo na gṛhyate,
SA11n1086:316: yaḥ prajñayā vastusvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣya na bhāvayan,
SA11n1086:321: evaṃ samyakpratyavekṣaṇāt samyagyathāvajjñānāgnibhāve'raṇimanthanāgnivat kalpanāvṛkṣo dahyate iti bhagavatā uktam |
SA11n1086:322: tathā uktam āryaratnameghe-“sa evam apakṣālakuśalaḥ sarvaprapañcavigamāya śūnyatābhāvanāya yogamāpadyate |
SA11n1086:323: sa śūnyatābhāvanabahulo yeṣu yeṣu sthāneṣu cittaṃ prasarati,
SA11n1086:325: tāni tāni sthānāni svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati |
SA11n1086:326: yat cittaṃ tadapi parīkṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati,
SA11n1086:327: yenāpi cittena parīkṣate tad api svabhāvataḥ śūnyaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ pratividhyati |
SA11n1086:335: tathā tayā prajñayā rūpādivastusvabhāvaṃ samyag yathāvat parīkṣya dhyāyati,
SA11n1086:340: prajñayā skalavastusvabhāvatāṃ prativīkṣya yasmād anupalambhaṃ dhyāyati-tasmāt prajñottaradhyāyī iti ucyate |
SA11n1086:343: aparasya parīkṣaṇīyasya darśanīyasya ca abhāvād uparatam,
SA11n1086:344: vitarka-vicāra-anabhilāpyaikarasena manasā svarasavāhinā anabhisaṃskāratastattvameva sphuṭataraṃ bhāvayan tiṣṭhet |
SA11n1086:346: yadāntarā rāgādīnāṃ cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣapet tadā vikṣepaṃ viditvā śighram aśubhabhāvanādivikṣepam upaśamya śīghraṃ tathatāyāṃ cittam uparyupari praveśayet |
SA11n1086:350: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yadā sphuṭapracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
SA11n1086:351: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pūrvavat pramodyavastu manasikāreṇa śīghraṃ layamupaśamayet |
SA11n1086:352: punaḥ tad eva tattvālambanam atidṛḍhataraṃ gṛṇhīyāt |
SA11n1086:353: yadi tadā pūrvahasitaramitānyanusmṛtya cittamantarā samṛddhataṃ paśyed auddhatyābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā anityatādisaṃvegavastumanasikārād vikṣepaṃ śamayet |
SA11n1086:354: tataḥ punastatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta |
SA11n1086:355: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhisphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittaṃ utpādayate,
SA11n1086:357: yadi samapravṛtte citte sati ābhogaḥ kriyate,
SA11n1086:365: yadā ca vipaśyanāṃ bhāveyat prajñātiriktatarā bhavet,
SA11n1086:366: tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthita-pradīpavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭaraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet |
SA11n1086:369: yadā ubhayaṃ samapravṛttaṃ tadā anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet |
SA11n1086:370: satyāṃ kāyādipīḍāyāṃ tadantarā sakalameva lokaṃ māyāmarīcisvapnajalacandropamapratibhāsavad dṛṣṭvā īdṛśaṃ cintanīyam |
SA11n1086:371: amī sattvāstu evaṃ vidhadharmagāmbhiryānavabodhatayā saṃsāre saṃkliṣṭāḥ |
SA11n1086:373: tathā kariṣyāmi' iti cintayan mahākaruṇāṃ bodhicittābhimukhīṃ kurvita |
SA11n1086:374: tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret |
SA11n1086:378: evaṃ yogī anena krameṇa ghaṭikām ardhapraharam ekapraharaṃ vā yāvatkālecchāparyantaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvayan tiṣṭhet |
SA11n1086:380: tata icchayā samādherutthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet,
SA11n1086:381: amī dharmāḥ sarve paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvāḥ santo'pi saṃvṛtau vyavasthitā eva |
SA11n1086:384: “bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ |“ ityuktam |
SA11n1086:385: amī bālabuddhayo niḥsvabhāvavastuṣu bhāvādisamāropeṇa viparyastabuddhayo bhavanti |
SA11n1086:388: tataḥ sarvajñapadaṃ prāpya tān dharmatām avabodhayeyam |
SA11n1086:390: atha śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhobodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādimahāpraṇidhānaṃ praṇidadhīta |
SA11n1086:393: āryaratnacūḍe yathoktam-“sa maitrīvarmasaṃnaddho mahākaruṇāsthāne sthitvā sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhinirhāradhyānaṃ karoti |
SA11n1086:398: asati ca tathā buddhānām kṣetrādisaṃpattiryoktā sā kasya phalaṃ syāt |
SA11n1086:399: tasmāt sarvākāravaropetaṃ tatsarvajñajñānaṃ tu dānādyupāyena paripūryamāṇatvād bhagavān tat sarvajñajñānam upāyena paryantagatam ityavocat |
SA11n1086:400: tasmād bodhisattvena dānādyupāyo'pi sevitavyo na tu śūnyatā eva |
SA11n1086:401: āryasarvadharmavaipulye “yo'yaṃ maitreya ! ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bidhisattvānāṃ sambodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti,
SA11n1086:405: tat kiṃ manyase ajita! duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo'bhūd yena kapotārthena śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni ?
SA11n1086:408: bhagavān āha-yāni mayā maitreya ! bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitā-pratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni,
SA11n1086:411: bhagavān āha-tvaṃ tāvad ajita ! ṣaṣṭikalpāna dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ,
SA11n1086:412: ṣaṣṭikalpān śīlapāramitāyaṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān viryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ |
SA11n1086:414: ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti te caryāpariśuddhā bhavantītyādi |“
SA11n1086:415: upāyarahite sati bodhisattvaḥ prajñayā eva tu śrāvakavat buddhakāryāṇi kartuṃ na śaknoti |
SA11n1086:417: āryaratnakūṭe yathoktam-“tadyathā kāśyapa ! amātyasaṃgṛhītā rājānaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kurvanti,
SA11n1086:418: evameva upāyakauśalyasaṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya prajñā sarvabuddhakāryāṇi karoti |
SA11n1086:420: bodhisattvānāṃ mārgadṛṣṭerapyanyā tīrthikānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca mārgadṛṣṭirapyanyā |
SA11n1086:421: evaṃ tīrthikamārgadṛṣṭistu ātmādau viparyāsayuktatvāt sarveṇa sarvaḥ prajñārahito mārgaḥ |
SA11n1086:445: prajñayā gṛhītopāyaḥ muktiḥ iti“ vistarena uktam |
SA11n1086:446: bodhisattvasya prajñāmātrasevanaṃ tu śrāvakeṣṭanirvāṇapatitatvād bandhanavad bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:449: tasmād vāyupīḍitena agnisevanavad bodhisattvena viparyāsavāyumātraprahāṇatvāt sopyāprajñayā śūnyatā sevitavyā,
SA11n1086:451: yathā āryadaśadharmasūtre coktam-“kulaputra ! tadyathā yathā kaścinmanuṣyaḥ agniparicaryāṃ karoti,
SA11n1086:455: gurūkṛtya mānitaśca iti kṛte'pi eṣa dvābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ parigṛhītavya iti na cintayati |
SA11n1086:456: tat kasmāditi cet tannidhānne mayi kāyikaduḥkhaṃ cittadaurmanasyaṃ vā sambhāvyate iti cintanāt |
SA11n1086:460: tannidhānād ahaṃ bodhiṃ nirvarteyam iti cintanād“ iti |
SA11n1086:461: kevalam upāyamātrasevane'pi bodhisattvaḥ pṛthagjanabhūmeranuttīrṇatvād atyavabaddha eva bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1086:463: evaṃ mantraparigṛhītaviṣavad bodhisattvakleśe'pi prajñāparigrahabalena bhāvite sati amṛtikatā |
SA11n1086:464: punaḥ svabhāvena abhyudayaphalaṃ dānādi yadasti tatra kimuta vaktavyam |
SA11n1086:465: āryaratnakuṭe coktaṃ yathā- “tadyathā'pi nāma kāśyapa ! mantrauṣadhaparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na vinipātayati evameva bodhisattvānām kleśaḥ prajñāparigṛhitatvād api na śaknoti vinipātayitum iti |“
SA11n1086:466: tasmād yena kāraṇena bodhisattva upāyabalena saṃsāramanutsṛjati tasmād nirvāṇe na patati |
SA11n1086:467: yasmāt prajñābalena sakalālambanaṃ prahīyate tasmāt saṃsāre na patati,
SA11n1086:469: tasmād āryagaganagañje'pi uktam-“tatprajñānena hi sarvakleśāḥ parivarjyante |
SA11n1086:475: atisamāhitāvasare vā dānādyupāyasevanāsambhāvanāyāmapi tatra prayogatatpṛṣṭhalabdhaprajñayoḥ yo'pi bhavati,
SA11n1086:478: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvānām ayaṃ hi prajñopāyayuganaddhavāhi mārgaḥ sarvasattvāvalokitamahākaruṇayā parigṛhītatvāt lokottaramārgaḥ sevyate,
SA11n1086:482: yataḥ samādhāne sattvāvalokitamahākaruṇāvalambane cittopasthāpanā sa eva upāyaḥ |
SA11n1086:483: yataḥ śāntipraśāntisamāpattiḥ sā tu tatprajñā “ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1086:484: māradamanaparicchede'pi uktam-“punaraparaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samutkarṣikaprayogastu prajñājñānena abhiyogaṃ karoti |
SA11n1086:487: upāyajñānena yaḥ sarvasattvaparipāko'pi prayojyaḥ“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1086:490: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato'sya saḥ ||
SA11n1086:493: bodhisattvanām prajñopāyavidhireva sādhyamadhikṛtya tatprayogasaṃsāre sthito'pi asti,
SA11n1086:496: paramārthabodhicittotpādārtha pūrvavat nityaṃ kāle kāle śamathavipaśyanāprayogo yathāśakti bhāvanīyaḥ |
SA11n1086:497: āryagocarapariśuddhisūtre-sarvāvasthāsu sattvārthakāribodhisattvānāmanuśaṃsā yathā nirdiṣṭā tathā saṃnihitasmṛtyā sarvadā upāayakauśalaṃ bhāvitavyam |
SA11n1086:498: tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittabhāvakaḥ sa iha janmani avaśyaṃ viśiṣṭo bhavati |
SA11n1086:509: atha ṛddhibalena anantalokadhātūn gatvā bhagavato buddhān pūjayati |
SA11n1086:518: tena tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittāni ca nityam ādareṇa ciraṃbhavitāni kramaśaḥ cittasaṃtāne atipariśuddhakṣaṇotpādena paripākabhūtatvād araṇimanthanāgnivat samyagarthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantaṃ gamanaṃ bhūtvā lokottarajñānasakalavikalpajālāpagamanaṃ niṣprapañcadharmadhātuprasphuṭāvagati,
SA11n1086:530: adhimuktibhūmau tu adhimuktivaśāt pravṛttirvyavasthāpitā na tu abhisaṃskāreṇa |
SA11n1086:532: tathā prathamabhūmipraveśaḥ tadanantaraṃ bhāvanāmārge lokottareṇa tatpṛṣṭhalabdhajñānena dvābhyāṃ ca prajñopāyabhāvanākrameṇa bhāvanāpraheyasaṃcitāvaraṇasya sūkṣmasūkṣmataravyavadānād uttarottaraviśiṣṭaguṇaprāptaye adhobhūmipariśodhanena tathāgatajñānaparyantaṃ praviśya,
SA11n1086:535: evaṃ krameṇa eva cittasaṃtānapariśuddhiḥ āryalaṅkāvatāre'pi uktā |
SA11n1086:545: iti prekṣāvān bhagavati buddhe sakalaguṇākare śraddhām utpādya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ svayaṃ sarvān prayatnān kuryāt |
SA11n1086:546: tasmād bhagavatā evamuktam-“tadetat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam“ iti |
SA11n1086:548: vivecya gṛṇhanti subhāṣitāni haṃsāḥ payo yatpayāṃsi prahṛṣṭāḥ ||
SA11n1086:551: prakāśya yat prāpi mayā śubham asamapaddhitam |
